attributes.action: Create labelling for all products to give an environmental rating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To create consumer awareness, just as food is clearly labelled to show fat content etc., all products and services should be assessed and given an eco score so the consumer may choose the most environmentally friendly product or service. All Invoices including checkout receipts would give total eco points of the products purchased and each consumer would have an awareness of an overall annual target to try and stay below.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
